dict.string: SkateConnect uses the camera to scan QR codes and to enhance user experience with AR features.
SkateConnect uses the microphone for voice commands to facilitate voice notes and to improve user interaction with our AI assistant feature.
SkateConnect uses your location to provide location-based services, such as finding nearby locations or enhancing our AR features with real-world positioning.
SkateConnect uses your location even when the app is in the background to offer continuous location-based services, like tracking your journey or providing real-time updates on nearby options.
SkateConnect uses the photo library to allow users to upload pictures.
